name: Clean and Green
title: Minimal Greenhouse Gas Emissions
description: In 2019 and 2023, Saint Kitts and Nevis recorded one of the lowest methane and F-gases emissions from buildings and industrial processes, respectively, at just 0.0001 Mt CO2e.

name: Investing in Minds
title: Significant Education Investment
description: In 2021, Saint Kitts and Nevis allocated over $13.7 million towards education, emphasizing its commitment to nurturing future generations.

name: Safe Childhood
title: Low Child Mortality Rates
description: With only one recorded death in both the 5-9 and 10-14 age groups in 2021 and 2023, Saint Kitts and Nevis boasts one of the lowest child mortality rates globally.
